message.content:
{"id": "13620", "title": "The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has text with a large amount of white space", "description": "The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has a label that is positioned in the middle of the page with a significant amount of white space around it. The vertical alignment of the label should be set to SWT.ALIGN_BEGINNING.", "OB": "The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has a label that is vertically aligned to the middle of the page, resulting in a large amount of white space around it. The label's vertical alignment should be set to SWT.ALIGN_BEGINNING.", "EB": "The label should be positioned at the top like the other labels on the page.", "SR": "1. Load a project from the repository.
2. Select a source folder.
3. Open Properties.
4. Select Java Source Attachment.
5. [details] You will see an info label in the middle of the dialog. The label should be positioned at the top like the other labels on the page."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '13620', 'title': 'Bug 13620The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has text with large amount of white space', 'description': '', 'OB': "Bug 13620The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has text with large amount of white space TThe Java Source Attachment Preference Pagehas a leabel that sits in themiddle of the page with a huge amount of white space. It's verticalAlignmentshould be set to SWT.ALIGNBEGINNING.STEPS1) Load a project from the repository2) Select a source folder3) Open Properties4) Select Java Source Attachment5 [details]) You will get an info label in the middle of the dialog. ", 'EB': 'It should be at thetop like other ones. ', 'SR': ''}
